name: Presently
description:
Presently is a UI presentation mockup resource that gives you access to more than 30 free UI mockups.

How to use (Method 1)

  1. Export your UI
  2. Open presently and select your choice mockup frame
  3. Select the shapes on the mockup frame and fill them with image you have exported
  4. You can also make adjustments to colors to suit your design


Method 2

  1. From your Figma desktop app, select the UI frame you have designed, right click and copy as PNG
  2. Open presently
  3. Select the shape of your choice frame and paste (ctrl + v)
  4. You can also make adjustments to colors to suit your design
